name: Long Island Iced Tea
description: A Long Island Iced Tea is a type of alcoholic mixed drink typically made with vodka, tequila, light rum, triple sec, gin, and a splash of cola, which gives the drink the same amber hue as its namesake.
ingredients: 1 fluid ounce sweet and sour mix
1 fluid ounce cola, or to taste
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice.
Pour vodka, rum, gin, tequila, triple sec, and sour mix over ice; cover and shake.
Pour cocktail into a Collins or hurricane glass; top with splash of cola for color.
